directions: Mix the garlic and olive oil in a small microwave-safe bowl. Cook 15 seconds in the microwave on High, or just until warm.
In a large bowl, toss together the garlic and olive oil, garbanzo beans, tomato, onion, and vinegar. Season with salt and pepper, and garnish with lemon slices. Cover and chill until serving.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can garbanzo beans (chickpeas), drained and rinsed
title: Preety's Chickpea Salad
